page.title: 01ABOUT GRID 05160300
page.content: Our area is on the outskirts of the town and includes nine small township areas,{Ravensthorpe,Paston,Gunthorpe, {Dogsthorpe,New England,Walton, {Millfield, Westwood and Bretton. { }It is mainly housing but industry is dotted around the outskirts of the grid. The main North/South London to Edinburgh railway crosses through the middle of the grid as does the main A15 trunk route to Lincoln. The{Development Corporation}have built a ring road around Peterborough and this passes East/West through our grid. Through our area it follows the route of an old railway.To allow this to be built{Fulbridge Road}had to be changed into a wide loop making a complex roundabout. There are many schools as well as good facilities for other activities in the area.
